DOC.brief_summary: A study evaluate role force oscillation precocious diagnosis bronchiolitis obliterans syndrome patient pulmonary transplant ( time difference detect distal airway functional impairment force oscillation standard technique use spirometry ) .
DOC.brief_title: Forced Oscillation Versus Spirometry Diagnosing Post Pulmonary Transplant Bronchiolitis Obliterans Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 yearold . Patients cardiopulmonary transplant bilateral lung transplant . Clinically stable patient Patients already diagnose bronchiolitis obliterans . Respiratory infection . Acute graft rejection . Mechanical complication ( bronchial dehiscence , pneumothorax , pleural effusion ) . Iatrogenic pneumopathy . Inability perform Respiratory function test .
